results.idea: Short-term EPS revision momentum
results.description: Core: stocks with accelerating analyst EPS estimate increases outperform. I used est_eps (coverage 0.7848, high user/alphaCount) and earnings_per_share_estimate_count to capture revisions. SUGGESTION1: used multiple fields (est_eps + estimate count). SUGGESTION2: not applied (fields scalar). SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage>0.6). SUGGESTION4: chosen fields have high user/alphaCount. I followed KEEP_IN_MINDs: implementation short, 2 datafields, <=7 operators. Confidence set to 0.72 because estimate momentum historically predictive.

results.idea: Earnings surprise (actual vs estimate)
results.description: Core: positive surprises (reported - estimate) predict short-term returns. I used anl4_af_eps_value (actual EPS) and est_eps. SUGGESTION1: two fields combined. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed (high coverage). SUGGESTION4: both fields have solid user/alphaCount. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.78 due to direct fundamental surprise link.

results.idea: TSZ-score of analyst mean EPS (mean-reversion)
results.description: Core: extreme short-term ts_zscore(est_eps) mean-reverts. SUGGESTION1: single main high-quality field est_eps. SUGGESTION2: no vec. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: est_eps high user/alphaCount used. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.6 (moderate).

results.idea: EBITDA upward revisions
results.description: Core: increasing est_ebitda momentum indicates growth. Used est_ebitda and anl4_ebitda_value (actual) to combine expected and realized. SUGGESTION1: used both. SUGGESTION3: est_ebitda coverage 0.6046 (~0.60) OK no backfill. SUGGESTION4: anl4_ebitda_value has very high alphaCount. KEEP_IN_MINDs OK. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: High analyst dispersion (mean-reversion)
results.description: Core: stocks with high analyst std dev of estimates often mean-revert post-announcement. Used anl4_ebitda_std (coverage<0.6) and anl4_ebitda_value. SUGGESTION3: applied ts_backfill on anl4_ebitda_std because coverage 0.3585. SUGGESTION1: two fields combined. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION4: anl4_ebitda_value has high alphaCount. KEEP_IN_MINDs obeyed. Confidence 0.55 (lower due to noisiness).

results.idea: Guidance surprise: sales actual vs sales guidance
results.description: Core: companies beating sales guidance outperform. Used actual_sales_value_quarterly and sales_guidance_value_quarterly. SUGGESTION1: two fields. SUGGESTION3: sales_guidance_value_quarterly coverage 0.3262 -> ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: actual_sales_value_quarterly high coverage. KEEP_IN_MINDs satisfied. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share momentum
results.description: Core: rising est_fcf_ps suggests improving fundamentals. Used est_fcf_ps (coverage 0.4642) so applied ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1: single field prioritized due to data reliability. SUGGESTION4: moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MINDs followed. Confidence 0.5 (data sparse).

results.idea: Information ratio of EPS estimates
results.description: Core: stocks with high IR of est_eps (stable upward estimates) outperform. Used est_eps (high coverage). SUGGESTION1: single field. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION4: high user/alphaCounts. KEEP_IN_MINDs OK. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum in cash flow from operations revisions
results.description: Core: rising est_cashflow_op signals improving operating performance. Used est_cashflow_op (coverage 0.6518) and cash_flow_from_operations. SUGGESTION1: two fields. SUGGESTION3: not required. SUGGESTION4: both fields have reasonable counts. KEEP_IN_MINDs satisfied. Confidence 0.63.

results.description: Core: rising book_value_per_share_reported_value vs est_eps momentum predicts re-rating. Used book_value_per_share_reported_value and est_eps. SUGGESTION1: two complementary fields. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: est_eps strong. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: High analyst consensus upgrades (median up)

results.idea: Strong cross-sectional rank of decreasing forecast dispersion
results.description: Core: quantile of reverse(ts_delta(anl4_gric_std,60)) to pick stocks where dispersion shrank most. Applied ts_backfill for anl4_gric_std (coverage 0.4073). SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Consensus upgrade confirmed by reported EPS beat
results.description: Core: combine est_eps positive delta with anl4_af_eps_value surprise. SUGGESTION1 used both fields. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: High reported net profit relative to guidance
results.description: Core: net_profit_reported_value minus max_net_profit_guidance signal. Both fields coverage good. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Rising est_ptp with low ptp std
results.description: Core: est_ptp momentum when anl4_ptp_std (stddev) low. anl4_ptp_std coverage 0.4695 -> backfilled. SUGGESTION3 applied. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: High-quality sales upgrades with increasing forecast count
results.description: Core: ts_delta(est_sales,30) * sales_estimate_count indicates broad upgrade. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Rapid EPS upgrades across brokers (count-weighted)
results.description: Core: increase in anl4_qfv4_eps_number with est_eps growth. SUGGESTION1 used two high-count fields. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Edge from shrinking guidance range for EPS
results.description: Core: anl4_afv4_minguidance and anl4_afv4_maxguidance narrowing (backfilled if needed). Both coverage ~0.6994; no backfill. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.52.
